speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: Welcome to Night Mountain!

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: There's not much here, honestly...

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: And it can get pretty boring...

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: But you should go talk to the others!!

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: Maybe somebody will need help with something?

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: Maybe they'll need to vent their frustrations?

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Uh. Hello.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: What are you doing here?

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: If you were expecting dynamic gameplay mechanics, uh.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I blame stress, myself. At least I'm able to talk, right?

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: This may or may not be exceedingly subpar. Yeahhh.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: The art is barely passable, the idea's too simple...

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I can't imagine a more disappointing final.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Did you know at one point the JSON for text...

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: ...was going to be several files?

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Yeah. That didn't happen.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Now I'm stuck with that insufferable cream.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Wait, what do you mean this isn't valid text?

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Is metacommentary not substantial?

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Chalk another one up to disappointing.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: To be honest, my creator's been losing it.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: For whatever reason, he fell behind.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Something strange kept him from seeking help.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Something about being undeserving?

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Well, it's his own fault.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: This is just the consequence of his actions.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Frankly, I find it insulting.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I would have loved to be animated, but nooo!

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I'm stuck living through half a dozen pictures.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Trust me, it ain't fun.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I suppose I should have mercy on my creator.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: After all, my very existence was in question.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: And perhaps, what little is here...

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: ...it demonstrates an understanding?

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I'm not impressed, mind you.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I've seen better from prototypes!

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: ...but there is something here.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Considering the misery that is HTML and CSS...

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: ...perhaps this is even a miracle.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: It's proof of ineptitude too, but oh well.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I am now cured of my badâ„¢.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Go check in on lilac, I think she may need it.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: oh.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: hi.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: why are you here?

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: i was under the impression the project would be over by now.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: i mean, aqua spoke for years so uh.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: why are you still here?

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: is this about sympathy at this point?

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: oh right i'm supposed to be divulging my issue or whatever.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: why can't cream just let me sleeppp.....

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: well uh.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: truth be told, motivation's been an issue for me.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: I just don't have it in me to do things I hate.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: I don't think it's even laziness anymore.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: like, I'm just spiralling and in pain when I try.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: everyone seems to just get it, and even when i know they don't...

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: ...nobody broadcasts the struggle, so I just feel bad?

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: that's about it.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: i just hope it's my own issue...

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: ...oh, you're still here.

speech.speaker: Lilac
speech.text: go see cream or something, i dunno.

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: So? How did it go?

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: You don't have to answer, I know you nailed it!!

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: ...what do you mean they don't care?

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: uh.

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: I'm sure if you go talk to them again...

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: ...they'll be glad to see you!!!

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: ...did Cream really send you back?

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I did what he told me to. I'm done.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: ...If I wasn't a PNG I'd go yell at him.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Why do you look so surprised???

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Obviously a PNG can't go yell at another one!!!

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: ...I don't have feet.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: Not to mention, my entire existence takes place here.

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: I'm pretty sure it's physically impossible...

speech.speaker: Aqua
speech.text: ...why am I telling you this, go away!

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: You have the same look on your face as earlier.

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: Don't tell me... they aren't cooperating?

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: ...Welcome to Night Mountain!

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: There's nothing else here, honestly.

speech.speaker: Cream
speech.text: ...I hope you enjoy your stay!
